department: Public Works and Government Services, PSPC
description: The Government of Canada requires a subscription agent to provide services for the acquisition, delivery, management and support of subscriptions to publications in various media, including print and electronic content. The subscription agent will have access to the Electronic Resource Management Platform.
full_summary:
# Request for Supply Arrangement for Ongoing RFSA Subscription Agent Services
## Background
The Government of Canada is seeking the services of a Subscription Agent to acquire, manage, and deliver subscriptions to various publications, as well as provide access to the Electronic Resource Management Platform.

### Scope of Work
The Subscription Agent will be responsible for:

* Acquiring subscriptions to publications of all types and media, including print and electronic content.
* Delivering, managing, and providing related support for the subscriptions.
* Accessing the Electronic Resource Management Platform.

### Tender Details
* Solicitation Number: WS3740006143
* Publication Date: September 7, 2023
* Closing Date: November 1, 2023 at 14:00 EST (Note: Cancelled)
* Expected Contract Start Date: December 8, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: September 18, 2028

### Procurement Method
This procurement will be conducted through a Competitive - Open Bidding process.

### Selection Criteria
The government will assess bids based on variations or combinations of the methods mentioned above.

### Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Contact Information

Matthew Curran
Contracting Officer
SPAC/PSPC
Phone: [None]
Email: [matthew.curran@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:matthew.curran@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Language(s) of Communication: English and French
